channel.title: Perl6 on Perl Weekly Challenge - Perl5 & Perl6
channel.description: Recent content in Perl6 on Perl Weekly Challenge - Perl5 & Perl6

item.title: A New Week a New Challenge
item.description: Welcome to the first task of the “Perl Weekly Challenge” event. Every Monday, we are going to propose 2 challenges, one aimed at Beginners and another for Experts. However you are free to choose the challenge you fancy. You can even attempt to solve both. As you know the choice of languages are Perl5 and Perl6. You can solve one challenge in Perl5 and other in Perl6, if you like. Please send us your solution by 6pm (UK time) Sunday 31 March 2019.
